1. timm/vit_large_patch14_clip_224.openai_ft_in12k_in1k: This model is a Vision Transformer (ViT) model pre-trained on a large dataset of images and fine-tuned on ImageNet-1k. It has a larger architecture compared to some of the other models on the list, which may lead to better performance on your dataset.
